metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12767 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
exif_entry_get_value in exif-entry.c in libexif 0.6.21 has a divide-by-zero error.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-2ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libexif package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-2ubuntu0.2').
